channel.title: [White-list][Offline-mode][xAuth][Core Protect][3.1.2] Tekkit To The LIMIT :D
channel.description:
Well since I want to play a tekkit server and mess around on one, might as well host my own right?
Server is whitelisted/cracked with a 17 player limit.
Plugins running:
[ol][li]xAuth[/li] [li]Core Protect[/li] [li]noLagg(modified)[/li] [li]World Edit[/li][/ol]
[s]In regards to noLagg, a core feature when dealing with item stacking and buffering has been disabled due to conflict with Red Matter tools and dropping items.[/s] [s]noLagg has been removed due to conflicts with its core features and tekkit, looking into pTweaks, just for directional region loading and entity managing[/s] noLagg has been heavily modified, all core features that conflicted with tekkit have been disabled, testing has been done to ensure no more conflicts between noLagg and Tekkit (Thank you Relmitos for the help and amassing the Turtle Army lol :D).
Point of the server is basically to be creative and to test stuff out/go crazy with. Since I'm picking the players i really only have a couple of rules:
[ol][li]Just don't damage each others stuff too badly[/li] [li][b][i]don't build underground[/i][/b] (this takes away from a lot of tekkit features)[/li] [li]easy on the spawning of items if you're an op.[/li] [li]Always check the wiki when asking questions[/li][/ol]
Already added/will be added (in no particular order)
[ol][li]Relmitos (op) (since he already played most of the mods and knows what he's doing, like really knows what he's doing :D)[/li] [li]kickingjamie[/li] [li]manbearpig[/li] [li]fuscate[/li] [li]jrubkletern[/li] [li]Tom5001[/li] [li]Agl1431[/li] [li]lustratio001[/li] [li]Travas[/li] [li]Big_n12[/li][/ol]
If I forgot you and I like you (:rolleyes:), or someone can vouch for your integrity, then you will be added :D
No pressure to get on or anything lol
IP: tekkittothelimit.no-ip.biz
Cracked launcher attached below for non premium players :o
Update: Requests for creative mode are being accepted, how you act on the server will determine if you get accepted or not (by either me or Relmitos)
[ol][li]You are only allowed to spawn cosmetic items to make or decorate your base, ONLY Minecraft Vanilla items and RED POWER MICRO BLOCKS, all blocks spawned must have an EMC value of less then or equal to 256[/li] [li]Abusing rule number one will result of all your work upon receiving creative mode to be rolled back[/li] [li]You must give an OP the coords of said base and there will be a time limit in creative, an OP has to be online for a player to be in creative mode[/li] [li]You are limited to being in creative mode twice and by the time an OP is online[/li] [li]Don't abuse an OP's trust, we all know eachother and have played for a while together (only reason why I'm allowing it), it'd be a shame to ruin that[/li][/ol]
To apply, simply contact an OP in-game :P
Update 2: All Core-Protect and [s]xAuth[/s] data is now stored and read via an SQL database, this should be more efficient :) -OP notice: The slight lag resulting from rollback is now gone :D Added noLagg once more, read above!
Update 3: World edit has been installed
Update 4: The server may be sporadically down for a short while between the hours of 2 P.M too 2 A.M PST, sorry for the inconvenience
What is being worked on: Webserver is currently being setup, WorldMap coming soon :)
A WIP project with Rel, details are not available at the moment since I need to deal with a few licensing/distribution issues, if your clever enough you can figure it out with what little I provided -More deats coming soon :) lol
Railcraft has errored recently, corrupting its data file, still don't know what caused this and hasn't happened recently
Check out the development thread located for the upcoming server [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,596173.0.html]here[/url] That is all :)
Server opened again :P RailCraft sucks... Cease all function with it...
[url=http://www.moparcraft.net/?server=tekkittothelimit.no-ip.biz][img]http://www.moparcraft.net/serverstatus/tekkittothelimit.no-ip.biz.png[/img][/url]

item.title: [White-list][Offline-mode][xAuth][Core Protect][3.1.2] Tekkit To The LIMIT :D
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“big_n12, post:29, topic:476283”]lol

just had to be sure you knew[/quote]
Yeah, next time when the server is off, or crashed, you really don’t need to flip out okay?

I’m busy between working on the server and homework, I told you things would get hectic since my brother left to uni yesterday so I can’t really ensure anything, Tekkit has a lot of problems and I can’t handle every single one of them like I used too over break. Right now, buildcraft pipes are crashing the server, so it’s either mcedit each and every pipe out of the world or start up a new one. So bare with me till I get the forge build fully functional, getting rid of all those crashes, and out of alpha testing.

Read full topic
